CustomField.description: Returns Checked if buying stage is different from previous buying stage
CustomField.formula: IF(AND(sixsense__buying_stage__c != null, sixsense__Previous_Buying_Stage__c != null, sixsense__buying_stage__c != sixsense__Previous_Buying_Stage__c), true, false)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Returns Checked if buying stage is different from previous buying stage
CustomField.label: Stage Changed
